directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and place in ice water until cool.
Toss pasta with onion, feta, balsamic, olive oil and tomato.  Serve immediately or chill 1 to 2 hours in refrigerator.
title: Awesome Bow Tie Pasta
